QuestData.Title: The Hidden Master
QuestData.Description: We should be able to handle the defense of Stoneplow from here on out.$b$b<The Watch Commander motions towards Lin Tenderpaw.>$b$bLin here is searching for someone she calls "The Hidden Master". I believe I know who she's talking about, and I have a clue for you.$b$bGo north.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Master Bruised Paw in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: You seek training?$b$b<The pandaren studies your physique for several seconds, without speaking.>$b$bAlright.
